item.title: Restart MP Rounds
item.dc:creator: Dmx6
item.description:
Hello,
for competive things it would be great if “mp_restartgame 1” would work in Black Mesa. Player will be respawned and Scores will be resetet & Time will be resetet.

Edit:
Maybe add the follwing commands from HL2DM:

//Command each player has to type before the match can begin (disabled by default)
mp_ready_signal ready

//if before the end, game will restart once every player gives the ready signal
mp_readyrestart 0
